text: Jeffrey Patrick Kinney (born February 19, 1971) is an American author and cartoonist. He is best known for creating the children's book series Diary of a Wimpy Kid. He also created the child-oriented website Poptropica. ==References== Category:American children's writers Category:American cartoonists Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Writers from Massachusetts Category:Writers from Maryland
title: Jeff Kinney
